Reviews.Title: Best phone, great service
Reviews.Author: Antonio "Tony"
Reviews.Content: I have been a loyal Net10 customer for more than four years. Net10 it's the best kept secret in the wireless communications industry. For a fraction of the cost of the legacy phone carriers, this low cost carrier delivers exceptional service.I switched my number from an old device to the GSIII online by myself just by following the instructions. In eight hours, I had my service transferred to the new smartphone.The smartphone I received is a GSIII S960L, and the Android version is 4.1.2. For $50 a month including taxes (autopay on credit card that can be terminated at any time. If you don't have a debit/credit card, it's just $5 more a month) I get unlimited data at 4G speed, unlimited talk, and unlimited text, I believe on Sprint's network. I am able to stream videos and use maps and all other "heavy" stuff. What can I ask more?

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Darren strohecker
Reviews.Content: I love this phone it is amazing!! the only down side is that the 4G LTE don't work so I can only use the 3G tho there isn't much of a difference. All around its a really good phone

Reviews.Title: did not work in my area
Reviews.Author: c.wallace
Reviews.Content: Did not work in my area. Was very disappointed when I received the phone. I have been very happy with the net10 service was disappointed to find out that this phone would not work properly in my area.

Reviews.Title: GREAT PHONE
Reviews.Author: Sarge
Reviews.Content: GREAT DEAL DUE TO REP AT AMAZON...THE ONLY THIS BAD IS YOU CANNOT MOVE APPS TO SD CARD AND IT WILL ONLY WORK WITH NET 10. OTHERWISE GREAT PHONE WAS SENT FAST NO PROBLEM FROM SHIPPER.. WOULD RECOMMEND AGAIN.

Reviews.Title: Great except the price
Reviews.Author: Alan E. Smith "OKWA76"
Reviews.Content: Get the same Galaxy SIII phone, same Net10 service for less money at [...] Why spend more here? It's stupid to waste money, don't you think?
